rev.desc.rev.desc: Modification made for CenterPoint Request 19065, Task 20818.

The schedule record identified by the Name of "OCM Create Order" was coded so that it used to call the application named ocmo.create.order (this is PRIOR to SC4). AFTER SC4, the application ocmo.create.order became rmo.create.order.

The upgrade was not reflecting this change, so a change was made to the upgrade so that it updates the schedule record identified by the Name "OCM Create Order" to call rmo.create.order INSTEAD of ocmo.create.order.
To effect this change, the post.data panel in this application was changed as follows:

descript.descript: Modification made for CenterPoint Request 19065, Task 20818.

The schedule record identified by the Name of "OCM Create Order" was coded so that it used to call the application named ocmo.create.order (this is PRIOR to SC4). AFTER SC4, the application ocmo.create.order became rmo.create.order.

The upgrade was not reflecting this change, so a change was made to the upgrade so that it updates the schedule record identified by the Name "OCM Create Order" to call rmo.create.order INSTEAD of ocmo.create.order.
To effect this change, the post.data panel in this application was changed as follows:
